name: UpdateChangeRequest
description:
Update an existing Change request in Freshservice.

Use this tool to modify the details of an existing Change request in Freshservice. Useful for updating information or status of Change requests.

parameters.name: change_request_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Change request to be updated.

value_schema.description: ID of change request to update

parameters.name: update_details
parameters.description: JSON object with updated change request details, including fields like 'id', 'subject', 'priority', 'status', etc.

requester_id.description: Unique identifier of the initiator of the change

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent to whom the change is assigned

group_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent group to which the change is assigned

status.description: Status identifier of the change. Open -> 1, Planning -> 2, Approval -> 3, Pending Release -> 4, Pending Review -> 5, closed -> 6

description.description: Short description of the change in HTML format

description_text.description: Short description of the change in plain text format

planned_start_date.description: Timestamp at which change is starting

planned_end_date.description: Timestamp at which change is ending

project_id.description: Unique ID of the associated project

department_id.description: Unique ID of the department initiating the change

created_at.description: Timestamp at which change was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which change was last updated

associated_release.description: Unique ID of the associated release

display_id.description: display id of the asset that is used for all operations

usage_type.description: Usage type of the asset  (accepted values are 'permanent' & 'loaner')

group_id.description: Managed by group of the asset

assigned_on.description: Date and time when the asset was assigned

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was last modified

type_fields.description: Fields specific to every asset type (Every asset will have default base fields and type specific fields)

associated_problems.description: Unique IDs of the problems associated with the change request

incidents_caused_by_change.description: Unique IDs of the incidents caused by this change request

tickets_initiating_change.description: Unique IDs of the tickets initiating this change request

custom_fields.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields

description_text.description: Reason for change in plain text format
Rollout plan in plain text format
Backout plan in plain text format

id.description: Unique identifier of the Change Window

window_start_date.description: Timestamp at which Change Window is starting

window_end_date.description: Timestamp at which Change Window is ending

id.description: Unique identifier of the Change Window

window_start_date.description: Timestamp at which Change Window is starting

window_end_date.description: Timestamp at which Change Window is ending

value_schema.description: change details that needs to be updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
